title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Biden gave Pittsburgh speech in empty room with handful of reporters, took no questions, lost his place when talking about COVID-19 deaths, even though the speech was prompter. Biden says he doesn't look like socialist radical. Biden says he's not banning fracking even though he's promised to ban fracking all through the campaign. Biden takes no questions. Biden flip-flopped on the Green New Deal, the centerpiece of the left's agenda. Trump goes to Kenosha and it scares the heck out of Democrats. If it was bad for Trump, they'd want him to go. Kenosha Democrat mayor admits the National Guard restored order. Dem governors, mayors caught out without masks, eating inside. Washington mayor says she fears a race war, but she really fears there won't be one; the Democrats are fomenting a race war. What will America look like when the left someday wins?

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Democrat data analyst says Trump will be ahead on Election Night, then Biden will overtake him in mail-in ballots. Democrats already saying Russia will interfere in 2020 election. Democrat data analyst on Axios, says Trump win on election night will be "mirage." Axios sending dire warning to Democrats that they have to steal more votes. Lifelong Democrat has switched sides after watching the left and listening to Rush. If Democrats really thought visit to Kenosha would hurt Trump, they wouldn't try to stop him from coming. Never Trump group to spend millions in Florida to help Biden -- and it won't matter.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

NYT claims "right-wing" groups are increasingly causing violence in cities after ignoring rioting and looting for months. What will America look like if left wins? Biden does not seem like a radical Marxist, but he's just a placeholder for the leftists who will run the country if he wins. If Biden wins, it will be because Democrats have no idea what they're voting for. Biden speech photo with masked reporters inside circles, with 100% compliance, dutifully behaving as they were commanded to behave by Biden campaign. Ivanka Trump line from RNC was very true: Washington didn't change Trump, Trump changed Washington. Trump tells CNN's Kaitlan Collins that her supporters in Portland murdered one of his. Trump says "shadowy figures" are behind Biden. Antifa has terrorized Portland for decades.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
